    • PG-DIP-8-905
      • IR2121datasheet
        Qualification: Industrial
        Isolation Type: Non-isolated
        Voltage Class: 5 V
        Switch Type: IGBT; MOSFET
        Channels: 1 channels
        Configuration: Low-side
        Fall Time: 26 ns
        Fall/Rise Time Load: 3.3 nF
        Features: Adjustable Shutdown; Current sense; Enable; Fault reporting; Over-current protection (ITRIP); Single input
        Input Vcc: 12..18 V
        Isolation: Functional levelshift
        Output Current Sink: 3.3 A
        Output Current Source: 1.6 A
        Rise Time: 43 ns
        Turn Off Propagation Delay: 200 ns
        Turn On Propagation Delay: 150 ns
        UVLO Input Off: 7.3..8.7 V
        UVLO Input On: 8.3..9.6 V
        UVLO Level: H
        UVLO ref: LS
        Product Status: active and preferred

        Turn Off Propagation Delay: 175..255 ns
        Turn On Propagation Delay: 175..255 ns
        UVLO Output Off: 11.7 V
        UVLO Output On: 12.5 V
        UVLO_ON: 12.5 V
        Product Status: active and preferred

        Features: Dual Input; CMTI greater than 150V/ns; Prop Delay Matching<3ns; Driver RON (1.2mΩ/3.1mΩ)
        Input Vcc: 3..3.5 V
        Output Current Sink: 2 A
        Output Current Source: 1 A
        Output Vbs: 4.5..20 V
        Rise Time: 6.5 ns
        Turn Off Propagation Delay: 30..42 ns
        Turn On Propagation Delay: 31.5..43.5 ns
        UVLO Input On: 2.85 V
        UVLO Output On: 4.2 V
        Product Status: active and preferred

    • PG-DSO-14-49
      • 2EDL23I06PJdatasheet
        Qualification: Industrial
        Isolation Type: Functional levelshift
        Voltage Class: 600 V
        Switch Type: IGBT
        Channels: 2 channels
        Configuration: Half Bridge
        Fall Time: 37 ns
        Fall/Rise Time Load: 4.9 nF
        Features: Enable; Fault reporting; Integrated bootstrap diode; Over-current protection (ITRIP); Separate pin for logic ground; Shoot through protection
        Frequency: 100 Hz
        Input Vcc: 13..17.5 V
        Isolation: Functional levelshift
        Output Current Sink: 2.8 A
        Output Current Source: 2.3 A

        Features: Enable; Fault reporting; Operational amplifier; Over-current protection (ITRIP); Separate pin for logic ground; Shoot through protection
        Frequency: 100 Hz
        Input Active State: LIN / HIN
        Output Current Sink: 0.35 A
        Output Current Source: 0.2 A
        Over Current Protection: Yes
        Turn Off Propagation Delay: 400..750 ns
        Turn On Propagation Delay: 400..750 ns
        UVLO Output Off: 7.4..9 V
        UVLO Output On: 8..9.8 V
        UVLO ref: Vcc / Vbs
        Product Status: active and preferred
